explanations.regression: The paper mentions using transparent linear power regressions for forecasting residual values of agricultural tractors.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper compares its method with support vector machine models among others.
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as one of the models compared against the proposed method.
explanations.decision tree: The paper compares its method with decision tree models among others.
explanations.neural network: The paper compares its method with neural network models among others.
